mapper.insert: insert into orders (number, status, user_id, address_book_id, amount, pay_method, pay_status, order_time, checkout_time, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_status, pack_amount, tableware_number,tableware_status, remark, phone, address, consignee) values (#{number},#{status},#{userId},#{addressBookId},#{amount},#{payMethod}, #{payStatus},#{orderTime},#{checkoutTime},#{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryStatus},#{packAmount},#{tablewareNumber},#{tablewareStatus}, #{remark},#{phone},#{address},#{consignee})
